name: Beater
description: Player who attempts to hit opposing players with a bludger.

name: Chaser
description: Player who attempts to score with the quaffle and keep opposing players from scoring with the quaffle.

name: Keeper
description: Player whose primary purpose is to keep opposing players from scoring with the quaffle but may also score with the quaffle.

name: Utility
description: A player who plays multiple positions.

name: Seeker
description: A player whose purpose is to catch the snitch.
